item.description:
Dance!

Northampton Wednesday Dance Night - Fun for all ages, no dance experience required! Come one, come all -- no need to have a dance partner -- they do a great job~

The Wednesday Night Swing Dance at the Northampton Center for the Arts

West Coast Swing, Salsa, Lindy, East Coast, Waltz, Fox Trot, Hustle & More

Get ready to swing cause every Wednesday is Dance Night!!!

Lessons 7:30 to 9:00 pm ( in West Coast, East Coast, and Salsa)

After the lesson use what yah learned at the Dance 9:00 to 11:30

Price: Dance & Lesson $ 10. Dance only $5 Students: Lesson & Dance $5. Dance only $3.

So pull out your dancing shoes and we'll see you there!

For more details:
http://www.northampto...


6:00-7:00 PM - Waltz lesson with Jacqueline Maidana($5)
6:00-7:00 PM - Lindy Hop (with Christine/Mark) Month long series in Lindy Hop starting the first Wednesday of every month. ($5)

7:00-8:30 PM - Lesson in East Coast Swing with Kent Divoll, West Coast Swing with Beth Duryea, and Salsa with Meli Morash. (Lesson and Dance $10; Students with ID $5)

8:30-11:00 PM - Dance with a DJ playing a mixture of Swing, Lindy Hop, Ballroom, Hustle, and Latin music. (Dance Only $5, Students with ID $3).

If you want to come for two lessons and the dance $15; Students $8.


Additional information about the lessons:
The first 45 minutes of the Swing and Salsa classes focus on beginners and the last 45 minutes focuses on the intermediate level.

The West Coast Swing lessons are taught in a month long series, starting the first Wednesday of the month and concluding the final Wednesday of the month


Things to know:

Please bring a change of clean dry shoes to dance in because we want to protect our dance floor.

One of the goals of our dance is to promote a safe and friendly environment wherein all people are welcome.

We work very hard to strive toward this goal and we have structured our dance and lessons with this concept in mind.

So if you are interested in meeting new people or just looking for a friendly place to learn to dance or a friendly place to dance then you have come to the right place

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Dance Wednesday
